response.overview: Kiryu Coco's last stream - The Graduation.  In this final stream of Kiryu Coco all Hololive Generations are sharing their precious memories and first impressions of Coco. All the members do reassure that they will keep in touch with Coco and come over to KanaCoco House for Yakiniku.  All that makes the path for the grand finale, where all members of the 4th Generation meet up in 3D. They read their own letters addressed to Coco in which they describe how Coco has influenced them and the entirety of Holoive.  After that they proof one last time that Yagoo's dream of an idol group is still alive and performed two songs as a group concert.  For the final Goodbey Coco sings her original song "Weather Hackers" and leaves the stage with a BIG SMILE, while all the JP Bros and Kaigai nikis are trying their hardest to smile beneath the tears :^)  [fyi: all of the 490000 viewers shed about 100l tears]
response.title: Kiryu Coco Graduation
